meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Ukraine.
meanings.sent1: I exchanged some hryvnas for souvenirs.
meanings.sent2: She received her salary in hryvnas.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine only accepted hryvnas, so I had to find an ATM.
meanings.sent4: His eyes lit up when he saw the pile of hryvnas on the table.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hryvnas clinking together was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A plural form of the currency hryvnia.
meanings.sent1: The shopkeeper counted the hryvnas in the cash register.
meanings.sent2: Tourists exchanged their dollars for hryvnas at the bank.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped a handful of hryvnas on the floor, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The hryvnas in his wallet seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent5: She saved up all her hryvnas for a special occasion.
